moduleMetadataJson.name: IPv6 Local Neighbor Discovery Using Router Advertisement
moduleMetadataJson.description:
Send a spoofed router advertisement with high priority to force hosts to
        start the IPv6 address auto-config. Monitor for IPv6 host advertisements,
        and try to guess the link-local address by concatenating the prefix, and
        the host portion of the IPv6 address.  Use NDP host solicitation to
        determine if the IP address is valid'
author: wuntee
d0lph1n98

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: Timeout when waiting for host response.

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: GATEWAY_PROBE_HOST
options.description: Send a TTL=1 random UDP datagram to this host to discover the default gateway's MAC

options.name: GATEWAY_PROBE_PORT
options.description: The port on GATEWAY_PROBE_HOST to send a random UDP probe to (random if 0 or unset)

options.name: TIMEOUT_NEIGHBOR
options.description: Time (seconds) to listen for a solicitation response.
